content.detailedDescription:
From 10:58pm to 11:07pm on july 4th my girlfriend and i spotted two star like ufo's in the sky.  my mother is a skeptic so we woke her up to go see them.  she came outside and was totally amazed.  there was a ufo coming from downtown at a high speed and coming the opposite direction.  we thought they were going to collide and they barely missed each other.

this happened right above our house.  after that happened they seemed to keep doing u-turns like they were showing off for us.  it was hard to tell if there were more because they kept turning and vanishing randomly.  

after of that ended my mother went back inside.  my girlfriend and i got on our bikes and when we got a block away another star like ufo appeared.  this time it started coming down quickly.  it looked like a little sphere maybe 8 ft around circumference.  it came down then shot off over by westminster.
content.summary: 2 star like ufos and 1 close sphere ufo in north denver

content.detailedDescription: This picture was taken over my beachfront on the great sacandaga lake, in ny. within minutes of sending it to brian vike, he had received one almost the exact same from the uk- also over water. then, i found another exactly the same from istanbul turkey (just google ufo-istanbul-turkey on youtube to find it-it starts with a view of istanbul from the ocean and appears at about 26 seconds). my picture was taken with a nikkon d200, the one on youtube was on video, so i don't think it's a camera defect. also, the thing was not visible when the shot was taken, but strangely, here's the really strange part. i was contacted earlier that week by a gentlemen who said he saw an article i authored in ufo magazine about a 1981 sighting i'd had outside albany- of three orange-pinkish orbs or circles the size of the full moon, which rose from the horizon and made right angle turns and other weird maneuvers before heading- in a blink of an eye- out into space. (i've had others) anyway, the guy sought me out because he said he had been seeing ufos in albany ny, one he said was manta shaped, but turned up as a cloud when he took a photo. i was suspect of his sightings for several reasons, but to make a long story short, he also has a camp here on the lake and called me the day before this particular photo was taken- to tell me that he was also seeing and  taking ufo shots here on the lake and was "vectoring in" the craft. i was ready to write him off mainly because he said an et was watching him from the balcony across the street from his apartment, and because he also told me that the ets were "aware of me"... then, the next day, shooting pictures on my beach, this turns up. huh. needless to say, i no longer throw out the baby with the bath water. i was amazed and am still, a year later, a little spooked. thanks, brett allen-former pyx106 disc jockey with a number one show on the number one albany ny radio station.
content.summary: Showed up in a picture of sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home, north on the 5 freeway. she woke me up to switch drivers and i looked northeast, saw some bright lights just above the horizon and jokingly said, "look, it's a ufo". she continued driving for about 5-10 minutes, looking for a place to pull off so we could switch. as we got closer to where the lights were that i had commented about just minutes earlier, we saw the lights moving around about 100 - 200 yards off the freeway and about 100 yards off the ground. she said, 'what is that!?', and i replied, 'i don't know'. she slowed down a bit,  we kept watching this thing moving around in the air, and i took two photos with my iphone. eventually, we passed it, but decided we should turn around and go look at it again. we exited, went over the overpass, and got back on the 5 south. again, we saw the lights moving around off in the distance, and got off the freeway at exit 379. we crossed the overpass again, headed towards the onramp to the 5 north and pulled off. i was scrambling around trying to find our camera, my wife was calling a friend of hers, and i eventually found a little flip cam video camera with which i began filming the object. unfortunately, the camera was just about full, so i only got about 23 seconds of footage. then, i started looking for our still camera again, but wasn't able to find it, so we just kept watching this thing. i got out of the car to use the restroom, and kept watching it. i looked down for a second, and when i looked back up, the object was gone.
i would describe this thing as triangular in shape, with bright, crystal clear, slightly bluish lights underneath, at each apex of the triangle. it was moving very smoothly. i can't say that it was doing horizontal figure 8's, but that's pretty close. it moved almost like a kite gliding through the air, making sharp, turns. it had 5 or 6 lights on one 'end' of it, because we could see that row every once in a while. when it banked on a turn, we could see the three on the bottom of it. it did not have any blinking lights on it, and all of the lights were the same bluish white color. it was moving, stopping, turning and banking, and did not make a sound. the impression i have of this thing is that whatever was driving it had a mastery of physics and aeronautics that i have never seen before. we have never seen anything move like that and we can't stop thinking about it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights flying near the 5 freeway

content.detailedDescription: I am a mufon field investigator and while on assignment handling 3 cases for mufon in altoona, pa, i was looking up in the sky and i witnessed an object flying across the sky with a contrail behind it.  it flew through a very small cloud bank to open sky & while in the open sky, it disappeared for 3 seconds only to reappear again emitting the contrail.  when it was invisible, no contrail was seen.
content.summary: An object was flying across the sky with a contrail behind it & disappeared for 3 seconds only to reappear again.

content.detailedDescription: I let the dogs out on sun 6/29 at 10:15 pm. movement in the sky caught my attention. i saw an extremely bright starlike object moving very fast (3000 mph) with no contrail or flashing lights. it was approx 10,000 ft high and larger than a plane at that same height. it moved behind clouds and didn't reappear. i saw it for only a few seconds based on the rapid speed. it was moving in a northeast direction.
content.summary: Large extremely bright object moving toward ne

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were having a campfire in our back yard at approx. 9:45-10 pm last night and noticed an unusual bright circular object  in the sky  with a brillant reddish orange color illuminating  moving at a slow pace. this object had no sound or blinking lights. it then stopped in the sky for about 1 min. then  proceeded to move upward at a very face pace in the universe, then suddenly  vanished. then about 45 seconds later we noticed a second object of the same description that did the same, stopped, hovered and vanished in the sky. these objects were something out of the norm and we are convinced that these objects were 2 ufo,s.
content.summary: 2 circular bright reddish orange flying objects hovering in sky,then ascendng

content.detailedDescription: We were stilling out on our deck. with the fire pit . i was looking up at the stars and then i saw this very shiny almost like a egg looking thing go fast and out of my site. i know and almost positive it wasnt a falling star.
content.summary: We were sitting ouside

content.detailedDescription: Early on three seperate mornings (7/1, 7/2 & 7/6 2008) unable to sleep i went outside in my backyard . while standing there facing south on the first night, i noticed a light changing colors and at first i thought it was just a star flickering. humidity may have been in the single digits that night and the other stars were barely twinkling. i watched for maybe 20 minutes and it kept flashing green, yellow and red but not moving. tired, i went inside and didn't give it much thought other than it was odd but probably could be explained. on the second night, awake at the same time again, i went out back to look in the same direction. there it was again and i watched again for 20 minutes before deciding to photograph it. i got my digital camera and tripod went back out and it was still there. i set it up with no flash and set the timer. the viewing screen on my camera is small and in the dark all i could do was point it in the general direction. luckily i got two shots with the object in them. when blown up the shots show the object and the other stars in the same area. this thing was not a star and appears to have an oval shape. the object did not leave it's location the whole time i viewed it during the first two sightings. around 2:15 am iwent inside to bed and it was still there. i write this on 7/6 @ the same time as my sightings on 7/1 & 7/2. this am it was it was there again! around two hands off the southern horizon in the same general area. it was flashing the same colors only this time it was moving east. blocked by trees and clouds i could only observe it for 60 seconds or less.
content.summary: Observed object hovering in sw sky flashing green yellow and red lights along it's edge.

content.detailedDescription: I was out back on my poorch smoking before bed and i was looking at the sky when i saw a square light red ufo fly from east to west at a very fast clip. it was not very bright and did not seem to be thick (from top to bottom but its hard to say how high it was. it was about the size of your thumb nail if you were looking up at it. i was just sure it was not a plain or any thing i have ever seen. there was not any noise. it hade a realy smooth flow to the movement.I just said to my self you have got to be kidding me. it just left as fast as it came smooth,silent and fast. the strange part of this story is that i told my wife about it and we went on vacation out west and we crossed into new mexico on or about june 19 th and it was dark out my wife in the passenger seat and i was driving when the same object flew half way over the sky and then shot strait up it did all this even much faster then the first time i had seen it in indiana with no noise this the first or second time. i did not say anything and my wife said what the hell was that. i was so happy she saw it so i was no longer the crazy one. i just don't understand how i was so lucky to see it 2 times.
content.summary: It flew strait but realy fast till out off sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Someone out there���help me out on this one.  i saw my first ufo as reported on june 17th, 2008.  since that night, i spend about 1 hour per night watching the skies���hoping to see it again.
since june 17th���i swear i have seen white orbs between 9:25 pm and 10:35 pm chicago time���every single night except one night.  in fact, i stopped reporting them as they became regular���and i am speaking to someone in a few days from mufon.  now���people have told me to get a photo or a video of it���and i have, and will download some of them as soon as i get access to a dvd drive���or have one installed.  but���tonight���i filmed a orange/white orb heading due north���pretty high altitude���and as reported���before���it stopped���and hovered.  but this time���it turned off the lights on the craft and it hovered somewhere.  i tried to re-acquire the orb for about 20 minutes with my video camera���but i lost it up there in the night sky soon after it stopped.  i kept looking.  suddenly���just north of where i thought it stopped���.  the orb lit up the entire sky around it.  it was by far the biggest and brightest light that i have ever saw in my entire life.  it looked like lightening in a huge circular sphere.  it was lower than when i first filmed it too.  i swear i pulled up my camera���and it immediately shut off on me!!  it took off slowly for one second���and the 2nd second���it took off faster than anything i have ever seen fly before!!  it streaked away���with a huge white trailer. it is so frustrating���because even if i was totally ready���and the camera stayed on���i would have missed it���it was simply too fast���it was gone in a blink of an eye.  it makes me almost skeptical of other videos.  who the hell can catch these things on film so easily?  i mean���who has a video camera on their shoulder all night long, like i just did for the last 4 days?  now..I have said before���and now i am reporting again���.Watch the skies between 9:25 pm���and 10:35 pm���chicago time���just east���and just south of the big dipper���and get on this site���and report it.  i have seen them start up from a dead stop���three times now���and it is the most amazing thing i have ever seen.  it is not a shooting star or meteor for sure.  it is a craft���it hovered���shut the lights off���and started up again���and took off.  something is controlling it���and i just don���t think it is the tr3-b���unless it lights up like a lightening bolt.  i will take a polygraph and provide my video evidence soon.   2 or 3 fly by without stopping per night���sometimes they are real high���and sometimes���they are lower���and someone out there will see them for sure.  report what you see to this site���no one believes me���and it is so frustrating���people think i am nuts���.But it is the truth.  i did catch the orb on film before the light went off���we will see how it looks later���i had the camera zoomed all the way in too.  you can see it moving for sure.  even if a skeptic was here tonight���and saw what i saw���he/she would believe from tonight on. now���i finally know how other people who have witnessed these ufo���s feel���you cannot sleep���you sit up wondering what the hell it was.  i just don���t think it was human.  now���i am not a trained observer���but growing up five minutes from o���hare airport���i know what a plane looks like.  i lived in arizona for 8 years, and i know full well what a meteor looks like.
this was neither���it was the most unbelievable thing i have ever seen.  i would say that at the speed it was traveling���it go from park ridge, il to milwaukee in only a few minutes.  check the skies���you will see something for sure. this could be something different than anything else before because it is consistently happening.
content.summary: It looked like lightening in a huge circular sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
I am attaching a photo taken in the early 1980s near cuba nm. the man in the photo is my friend tony and his horse. he does not remember who took the picture. he does recall seeing a flash of light at the moment the photo was taken. 
he loaned me the polaroid and i scanned it in as a pdf and a gif file. it is the strangest picture i have ever seen.
content.summary: Odd photo

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:00 pm, myself and 7 friends, were at a friends house in lake stevens, wa. we were lighting fireworks off in the street for the kids when i noticed two orange lights traveling about the speed of a small plane in a due north direction. as i watched it, i noticed a couple of oddities. they were very orange in color, and had no blinking lights. both lights were at the same speed and maintained the same distance to one aother for the duration of the sighting. also, the light was steady, no pulsating, no fuzzieness associated with watching a burning light such as a firework or jet engine. and they never changed course. the brightness of these object was about 4 times that of the north star on a clear night. these observations ruled out conventional aircraft. with all the fireworks going off in this area, i could not determine if there was any sound. although i can say that i was not able to make out any airplane or helicoptor sounds between explosions of fireworks in the neighborhood. i pointed out the lights to everyone outside at the time and everyone agreed that it was odd because it definatley was not a plane. we stopped the fireworks and watched for about 4 minutes as the lights slowly disappeared in the north sky as they became too distant to see. no one seemed scared or even disturbed by the sighting so once they were out of sight, we continued with the fireworks. i searched heavensabove.Com for anything that would come close to what we witnessed and did not find anything that was traveling in that direction at that time, and at that point in the sky.
content.summary: Glowing orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
It was the forth of july i live in the city my block is like a war zone on the forth of july 8in motors going off every five minutes these where not fire works.  i came home from wendys at about 11 pm  looked up in the sky over my house  and saw this glowing sphere it had a halo around it .  this object was high in the sky i watched it for minutes before getting my family to come out and see it.  just to see what they thought :). they watched it for 5 min also.  their was no smoke trail from this object it kept going in a straight line with no sound until it became to far for us to see.  then about an hr later my wife was looking out the dining room window and saw 2 of the exact objects float over the house and in the same path as the first one.  i watched these also for lets say a min went out side and they where floationg over my house again i called my 2 boys to come out and look at these objects.  as i was looking at the objects i was saying their going out like a flare or a paruchet.  i rly dont think it was a flare  or a parachute but u nvr know again i live in a well populated city i have neabors no less then 50 feet from my house also let me state this again their was not smoke trail and they pluseadted
1. i was getting out of my car with wendys.
2. i always look at the sky plus it the 4/7/08.
3. a flare or parachute
4. pluseated no noise had a halo ive nvr seen anything like it.
5. my first reation was what is that 
6. all  i can say is it looked like something that was at full power then went to 1/2 power then back to full power then glowed real faint then i lost sight of it we tried to to get vedio but the cam corder was out of batteis
content.summary: Dark to bright golden orange with halo  pulsating

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine was giving me a guitar lesson in his backyard. he says look over there around 2:00 in the eastern skies. i see an egg like object, just hanging around. he and his mother tell me its been in the skies for days.
content.summary: Egg like object, hanging around the eastern skies for days

content.detailedDescription: Around 10pm, while watching some local fireowrks, my family, which consisted of nieces and nephews, saw a round, red, globe like object that at first appeared to be hanigng in the sky. after a short while it appeared to be moving very slowly in a northerly direction. its location was towards the west in the opposite direction to where the fireworks were. after approximately 4 minutes it slowly disappeared, taking around ten seconds. aprroxomately five minutes later two more globes appeared at the end of the street in the northern part of the sky. their description is the same as the first object, a red, glowing globe.   they were again moving very slowly in a southwest direction more or less towards us and were separated from each other by several miles.  there is an open field at the end of the road and then a small shopping plaza. the first red light began to disappear after approximately 3 minutes and then vanished. the second red light, which was the furthest remained in view, moving slowly, for another ten minutes and then it too just vanished.  we saw no further lights that same evening.
content.summary: Saw round globe like object moving very slowly and then disappearing....

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting in my living room watching television when i heard what sounded like huge jets going by. the sound was unusualy loud like they were just above the building. they seemed to go by one at a time. i did not think anything about it considering it was fourth of july. the next day as i was reading the news paper, (worcesters' telegram and gasette)sat.7-5-08. people reported the noise to police from worcester, auburn and leicester. local airport did not recieve any info on military flights and nothing on radar. though the noise was unnerving and frightened some people, it only lasted about ten minutes. it remains a mystery.
content.summary: Did not see anything because of rain and clouds, but noise was like that of huge large jets.

content.detailedDescription: i was watching fireworks from my driveway looking to the south, most of the fireworks have stopped but a few were still going off.I happened to look to the south west when i saw these strange lights that were not there a moment before,the objects travelling slowly in a north by northwest direction in a large triangular pattern, much higher than the fireworks, then one "the western most point" seemed to disappear. then the other two shortly afterward, seemed to  head up, one at a time towards the atmosphere until they either went out of sight or disappeared. i tried to capture them on my cell phone video camera, but was unable to see them on the screen. what do i think they were? definately not fireworks or airplanes.
content.summary: 3 ball like orange objects in triangle formation heading north-northwest.

content.detailedDescription:
In the late afternoon on or about halloween in the year 2000, i was puzzled to see some lights blinking outside the window, and i stepped outside on my front porch in west madison and was amazed to see to the southwest three large grey colored kite-shaped objects in the sky in a straight line facing east. they were at least as large as water skiing kites and were at least a mile away and about quarter-mile apart. they had one or more lights on them (i think they were white), and the lights were flashing in synchonized patterns. for example, first the left-most one would blink, then the middle one, then the right-most. the lights flashed in various patterns. they were not moving, and they were there for quite a while, maybe an hour. i watched it for awhile, off and on until it got dark. at one point i checked again and they were gone. 

my wife at the time told me that she had heard of these things from someone at work who said this was an annual halloween prank someone pulled. however, at a later date, i asked a long-time madison resident if she had ever heard of this annual stunt, and she said no. i have never seen these objects again, and now i have to wonder whether they were a halloween hoax or a ufo. has any one else seen these things?
content.summary: Halloween hoax or ufo?

content.detailedDescription: I thought i would lay in my bed and watch the local fireworks show out the bedroom window (sw direction) which is facing lake erie - the show was going on a while but i began my watching at l0:30 pm - there in the sky was a pulsating disc star-like object first just sitting there watching the fireworks i assume-suddenly the star zig zag fashion changed its location and came closer -i noticed it was pulsating then and had green lites - it kept changing location towards me then towards the falls to see their fireworks - it never became invisible which surprised me.  after a few hrs. it was joined by 3 discs who were running only their outside edge running lights around their crafts, solid lites on not pulsating, not shiny.  they flew up nearby the shiny pulsating craft and then shut off their running lights and sat there; funny part of that was that their lights went off like a dimmer switch and some did not fade from view completely so their were still visible in the sky; and some did go completely invisible.  after watching for a few more minutes the 3, now 4 total were suddenly joined from the sky below in the area of lake erie by l0 similiar craft which jolted me fully awake at this point and i thought to myself well now that was interesting to say the least and kind of proves that there may be a base close by!  the others were straight in their flight path got into their respective positions and just sat there not moving after that zip across the sky. the larger shiny ship apparently called the others to join him as once he had company he stayed in one location and no longer zipped back and fourth as he was previously doing; guess he was in charge of chosing the best location to see both shows perfectly judging from his attempts at going over the falls and then back to my location. i watched until 3 pm waiting for someone to move closer or do something else or be joined by more craft. nobody moved and i fell asleep holding my bedroom window curtain, then falling into bed. i thought to myself how nice, they like fireworks too, then when all the others came i was more then amused and remember saying out loud holy god to myself! i was amazed at how many there were not the fact that they were there and i was angry that they were too far away to see up close.  i especially wanted to see the large shiny one up close like the others but he stayed far out and let the others have the best location and views since he watched quite a spell by himself before calling others to come see. i had the feeling he wanted them to get there and sit invisible and not call attention to themselves.  i got the impression that they want to not have to change their base and move away from here. i have never seen so many crafts in one spot, at one time before - that was unnerving and i felt fear followed by a protection for them - i was not sure if i should report this information or not - maybe we ought to just let them live there in peace period and not disturb them.  ps a plane on final into buffalo came past my house just before the fleet of ships came out and i remember thinking they had waited for him to begin his descent before they came into sight so it is obvious they want to remain hidden etc. etc. etc.
content.summary: One pulsating star-like disc joined by 3 discs with running outer edge lites on only; followed by l0 others who were watching the fireworks display at the falls and local area fireworks near vicinity of south buffalo

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from quick check on pennington rd in ewing twp, nj to pick up an item for my son in the morning that he requested.It was a hot summer night, clear skies in the end of week of july 2006. there were several men working on the street with construction near the mobil gas station not far from the intersection of olden/pennington ave. there were cars out, but it was not very busy. i attempted to turn on my radio of car once i left the store,but it was not working correctly.I even thought, umm. something is wrong with the radio is it so static..So, i turned it off. approx.1:25 am after leaving the store, i made right turn onto olden avenue in direction to the high school, pass mcdonald's and pass offices on my left hand side of car. at that point pass the little white stone bridge of the near the church property, across the street, i viewed a reddish/green light circle approx.3 ft circle, in the trees on my driver's side which never in past seen before. olden avenue is a normal route to get to my home approx. 3 blocks away from that specific location where i saw this object. i drive this road daily, it was the first time i had ever seen something like this. i have lived in the town for over 20 years.  i thought it was strange seeing this light circle object,  and i passed it slowly on my left side driver side.It was about 100ft away. it was inside the trees. i expressed,"what is that? where is that comming from?" i didn't see anything projecting from it. there were a few cars infront of me in a distance on olden ave the same direction i was going, but they were ahead of me,by the time i saw this, no cars where infront of me.It was quiet on olden avenue. it was in the trees above near the side of the house i continued to go slowly passing it on my right side of car, alittle further at the next street which was less than several feet away, i saw a very large boomerang object, size 1/2 football field in length hovering over treeline of homes open space area from my driver's side window. i was on olden avenue and this huge object was adjacent to my view on the left side while i was in my car from the street. it was approx 300 ft away from me seeing from the distance.It hovered over several homes, and i couldn't see the other side of the object. it was silent, bobbing alittle, not in moving position.I didnot hear any noise from it. i said, oh.My god, what is that? that is huge ufo!! that is not a plane, helicopter,or anything i had seen before.No miltary craft would be out doing this above these houses.( airforce base is about 35 min. by car in south direction of town.We have an airport in town too, but not anything flying object seen shape like this before.It was no stealth flyer. this thing looked like a mothership of a huge object. we are about 10 minutes from delaware river) that thing is too close to the ground. i got to get out of here, now!!" i did not see any people walking on that specific street that night. the v shape bommerang was a solid object, silvish color,with long end pointing to direction to north. the sideof the object had with several lights which hovered above treeline of the homes.(glendale sect.)it was very noticable, and i wondered if other neighbors saw it. i was overwhelmed,scared and shaking.I never seen anything like this before. i could only view one side of it, that how large it looked from its expansion, i saw a blub white object on the bottom of it. i have never seen a shape of a strange flying that low proximity at all near ground level.I even tried to say to myself it was a military object, but logically i said they would not be doing this kind of miltary exercise over people's homes.There is no reason for them to do this.This is wild!! it was so close to ground level over these peoples houses. i was totally overwhelmed what i viewed.I continued to drive slowly.Less than 10 miles a hour.I checked if cars behind me and none around.I took the next rt turn onto glen mawr to get to my house several blocks away from this location. i had no time elapse and i was not abducted. i was saying the lord's prayer driving home to myself. it was about 4 minutes later from what i just viewed to my house. i remember still shaking in my car when i turned into my driveway. i had to calm down before entering my house, because my teen children were watching a movie at the time.I entered the house, and my oldest child saw my expression on my face. my daughter knew something was wrong. i sat with them and explained what i viewed and tried not to frighten them. i said maybe it had to do with the military. at that time, the skies were active with planes around here. my daughter admitted hearing a story years ago at the fields near trenton state, someone expressed a craft was seen. i had no idea that this stuff was happening around here. i told them that i was not going back to see it again lets forget about it until we speak to their dad..My husband was on a trip, expect him the next day. i said no one is going to believe me if i call the police.I didn't want to call him because it was late.My son and i went to computer to see if this object had been seen before. i saw a drawing that looked so similar like the one in hudson valley sightings in the l980's.I didnot sleep well that night..My adreline was up and deep down inside i was concern what i had seen a few hrs before. next day, my car in driveway didnot work in morning for several hours, unusual behavioral pattern of wild yellow bird and a large turtle shown up my frontlawn consectively 2 days in a row in the same location on my our property after this ufo incident the following day. the car started up before my husband returned home.When my husband came home and i told him what happened, he laughed and told me not to worry about it.I even thought i may have a wire loose with system in the car, but then i canceled so see the mechanic since the car started to work okay.If it happen again, i will bring it to the shop. then the unusual things started to occur outside of my house on my front property..First, i saw this yellow bird little larger than a canary when i was in a car with my husband when we were talking privately in the car in our driveway. the bird flew onto the review mirror of passenger side.It was like it was trained and not frighten of humans. it stayed on the car for a while atleast 10 minutes.It went on the mirror to the car hood near the front glass of the car..My husband and i both commented what a beautiful bird and how friendly this wild bird behavior coming onto the car when we were sitting inside of it. we thought it was sweet alittle unusual, but neither of us didn't think anything about it. we then went inside and didnot see the bird again. that afternoon, i found a 2ft size turtle on my front lawn before plans were made to mow the grass. i don't live near a forest at all and this was the first time this ever happen to see one around on my lawn. i called my son out of home and let him view it.It reminded me of my late father when i was a child would bring turtles to my home..I would take care of them and then let them go in the wild. i said that is strange, seen 2 living creatures never been around before on my property on the same day..Never seen any yellow bird before at all, but i know they are around in nj. when time to mow my lawn, turtle was gone, and didn't see the bird except when i was in the car speaking to my husband...I even went out checking the bushes, didn't see the turtle at all. i was afraid that my dog would get it since he had a tendency to run out of my house at times..Second day, was very strange. next day,i was in my car in my driveway in the morning about 9am, reading the paper that i just went to get before entering the house.  the same yellow bird showed up again and began erratically attacking my car side window when i was in it for 15 minutes.I timed it. i said, what is wrong with this crazy, wacky bird? i am not getting out of the car until it calms down.It really acting weird. never seen a wild bird doing this kind of reaction of behavior out of the blue. i ask my neighbors yesterday if they were missing a pet bird and they said they didn't have one. i am reading the paper and it is pecking at my window of the side of car.I felt like it wanted me out of the car. i finally decided to get out of car with my roll newpaper saying to myself if it comes near me, i will swat it like a baseball flying in the air..Hahahaha..I had to laugh it was so crazy.I opened my side of drivers door and it flew off..Well, i walk onto front area to steps..The turtle that i seen the day before at another part of front lawn is now at the steps going to my front door.I said, where did this turtle come from, i checked the bushes yesterday and it was not around. i called my son and husband out of the house to see the turtle.My son even said, isn't that the turtle we saw yesterday? how did it get here? i said, mr. turtle is definitely not comming inside this house. i said something weird is going on..Too concidential that we see these things 2 days in a row first time out of all these years on my front lawn. i was wondering if it had a connection to the ufo situation.I said i see a ufo, car not working then started up again, and then reptile and bird show up that never seen at all before on our property, let alone on our frontyard? i said something is not right.  i said"i don't know where you came from since you were gone yesterday and you show up at my doorsteps?" my husband was quiet about it and said, lets just leave it alone. it will go away again." i didn't touch it at all.When we came back from store, it was gone. nothing out of the norm happened again until next early morning hrs. i was up doing my work while family was asleep.I went to bedroom about 3 am.I said my nightly routine prayers. i was sitting on my bed and turned to the window. didn't notice anything happening at all when i entered the room. the hall light was on, but not my light in my bedroom.  about 5 minutes later, i saw a very bright white light from my bedroom window with the shade partially open that faces the outside of my street. this bright light was projecting to the ground on my street going upwards the top end of the street. didnot go near window to see what created that light from the sky. but it was very bright.I was saying please god don't let it shine on this house. i didn't turn the lights on in my house, because i was frighten it would create attention to whatever was creating it..It was so noticable, it lit up the street up. my street was completely quiet. i covered myself with my sheets with my head direction to window, and i counted it for 9 seconds. when it disappeared,i said." what was that??I said that is no lighting, and the lamp post didn't create that light." i was fully awake. at that point, i was shook up. i know what i just saw and that was not a normal occurrance. i didn't wake up my family because i felt they would have been scared.I finally feel alseep about 6 am when daily light.  i woke up in the morning, i decided to go outside. i saw a marking on the street that left a residue white chalky substance at the place i saw the light first protruding to the ground on my street.I refuse to touch it.I have photos of it. that specific mark has not disappeared under any weather condition since this bright light occurred in july 2006. i never touched the marking left on the street at all. i thought it was important to write this today since someone else also admitted viewing an ufo in glendale sect. on your website.This is not far from where i live in the same town in ewing twp, nj. there have been increase sightings around this area. i have not seen any ufo's after this occurance in 2006.I don't go out looking for them at all.It was my first time ever seeing itin 2006.I have not seen one since it happened. i never believed in these things were real until i experienced it myself. i don't have hallucinations or use drugs/alcohol at all.I worked in professional field until i retired 10 year ago. i know exactly what i saw that night, including the other strange occurances that happened a few days in a row afterwords.My family witnessed the yellow bird and turtle seen too. i have spoken to a few individuals in my town who have admitted to seeing other objects in this town and surrounding area after i have discussed my own personal experience.I would take a polygraph and pass too!! something is going on around this area..
content.summary: Viewed a bommerang object -1/2 football field large hovering over homes in glendale sect. of ewing, twp

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were walking at night from his house to get a shake from a fast food restaurant in our chicago suburb of elmhurst. after walking about 10 minutes, we suddenly stopped in our tracks, having seen 6 lights in the southern sky, about 45 degrees altitude. their movement was constant but slow individually in their relative unit and even slower as a single unit across the sky. the formations changed from what appeared to be a sloppy v shape to a polygon of a sort. they seemed to be headed toward the north, but they never crossed the zenith from our apparent view.   they were visible for about 40-50 seconds, glowing subtly from orange to red, then dimmed out one-by-one within 10 seconds. there was a second appearance 10 minutes later when we were in the parking lot. i stopped to take a photo with my iphone, though the quality is very poor. there are some false artifacts in the photo from the parking lot lights, but if you look above the second small parking lot to the right, you can see 3-4 lights above it.  please inform me of similar sightings. thanks
content.summary: Night of fourth of july, there were 6 glowing lights in the southern sky, 45 degrees above horizon. they moved slowly and changed shape. lasted about 40 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i saw what i think may be a ufo was in scotland in a pasture where the tour bus had stopped when i was on a high school trip, which is coincidentally the same week of the same year that my wife had gone on a trip visiting england and scotland during high school. we may well have met during our two separately organized trips, something we learned after we were married when looking through old photos. i still remember the ufo sighting vividly and may have caught the craft on film, since i distinctly recall taking photos of the environment, hearing the sonic boom, falling back on my butt and seeing the craft in the sky for brief instant. i'm pretty sure it was a chevron/triangle shape. the craft couldn't have been more than 200 feet above ground during daylight and was just hovering for a few seconds. i know some others in my school saw it and we talked about it during the bus ride to the next city. this happened at the age of 17, and i didn't "meet" my wife until i was 28.

the second time was while i was living in japan at the age of 24 while living and working as an english teacher on a tiny island in the seto inland sea called mukaishima, across from onomichi, a famous city in hiroshima prefecture which was once one of the most important centers of trade in all of japan. onomichi has a population of about 100,000, and mukaishima i recall was around 19,000. the event took place at fireworks festival in the channel that ran between mukaishima and onomichi. i was seated on the western coast along the channel of mukaishima with five other friends, three japanese and two americans, sarah from boston and jacqueline from new york city, who also lived on mukaishima. during the fireworks display, we all noticed a chevron/triangle shaped craft appear from behind the mountains on the north side of the island, hover and then disappear into the mountains and then the sky. we all looked at each other and confirmed what we had seen. it was unmistakeably unusual because there are no airports or landing sites in mukaishima and the winds around the bridge from onomichi to mukaishima on the north side of the island are too strong for someone to even consider flying there.

the third time was when i was 34 and living in orange county, new york, where i now reside with my wife - the same woman i may have met while i was in scotland in high school - and two kids. my wife sleeps upstairs with the kids, and i sleep downstairs since i wake early to travel to new york city for work. we were both awakened at an early hour around 3am to a very loud ongoing noise near the house that for some reason did not awaken either of the kids. we were drawn to the very large window on our second floor landing that overlooks the front lawn. there right in front of our eyes was unmistakeably a ufo. it was the closely either of us had ever been to a craft unlike anything we've seen. i've seen a lot of crafts and was fascinated by ones that were built by humans at an early age. there was a blue light eminating from the craft and visibly shining into our window. it must have hovered for what seemed like two or three minutes. we were both in a state of shock and just froze. i recall saying to my wife to go check on the kids and make sure they're alright because i just sensed fear. the only emotion i can recall was fear. what appeared to be two creatures unlike anything i had ever seen maneuvering this craft no more than twenty feet from us outside our window scared the living daylights out of me. i'm pretty sure we left the scene long before they took off. i was really afraid.

there have been numerous instances in the past four years since i was 34 where my wife and i distinctly recall seeing unusual things, whether the sightings are ufo's or not who knows. the most recent was last month at the age of 38, where i was home alone. my wife was still at work. the kids were at school. i am a consultant and was working from home that day. i was sitting in my office near the front of the house doing some work at my laptop, which is right next to a desktop computer that was switched off at the time. all of a sudden the speakers to my computer started emitting a signal that sounded oddly comprehensible at times but at times like a foreign language. i can speak japanese and at one time knew hebrew and spanish. my wife can speak 4 or 5 languages, as well. i even learned a bit of swahili in college. i never heard any language like this. there were clearly patterns in the signal of a language. but regardless the amazing thing is that my computer which is off is emitting signals. this is simply not possible. i work in the field of technology and have been around a lot of emerging technologies. then my television in the living room, also off at the time, and a stereo system which wasn't even plugged in, all turned on and started to display random programs. nearly every electronic device within 20-30 feet of me was on, not by my own doing. as i walked around my house, the electronics in whatever room i went in turned on. i don't smoke, do drugs or drink. i may have a glass of wine once or twice a year. it was about 2-3pm in the afternoon. after noticing all of this, i had the urge to go outside and see what the heck is going on. i immediately thought maybe it's a military craft from west point or some other military installation hovering close to my house for some unknown reason causing all the electronics to go haywire but i was startled to find a chevron/triangle craft just above the house maybe 80 to 100 feet in the air just above the treeline. again fear. i ran back inside and went for the videocam in the closet but by the time i went back outside the craft was gone.

i do not want fame. i do not want people on my property taking photos. i just don't want to be abducted or whatever. you know i just want my family to be safe. whether it's the military or aliens, somebody is really interested in me, my family or my house. my house used to be a farm property and i was told there used to be a barn where my house now sits. the property is full of slate just a foot or two below the ground surface. the visits from such crafts have become so much more frequent that i'm really scared, to be honest. my wife and i picked up the kids from pre-k the other day and on the way home listened to 99.1 fm where they had a program on mufon. we talked about it, and several days went by. i am now writing just as much to get this off my chest as i am to seek guidance. i've never revealed this to anyone but my wife. i am a senior executive in information technology and can't explain any of this logically though i consider myself highly intelligent and logical.

i want to remain anonymous but i feel i need some expert advice to the extent that i don't want to get abducted and fear that the frequency of sightings may lead to some kind of undesirable event, but i don't want to draw attention to me or my family. i would privately welcome input from those more experienced in this. lately i've been having a lot of bizarre dreams, too. i don't know what it all means. my wife commented just the other day that "they" seem to be very interested in us. we are both very educated with masters degrees and of sound mind and body. if it's just the military, great. maybe i'll sleep a lot easier. i even called the police to see if they were searching for someone or if there were any planned military exercises in the area that i should know about. not that they would tell me anyway, but of course they said "no."

the last thing i want to say is that i am looking for a new job and just realized yesterday when my wife asked me where some of the leading jobs are located that two of the three leading ones are within 2-3 hours of roswell, nm. i've never been to that part of the country. i have no reason to want to live or work there. i have no family there. call it chance or coincidence. just the same, it is a bit unsettling to think subconsciously i might be drawn to that area. possibly for a reason.
content.summary: Multiple sightings (see below)

content.detailedDescription: We were watching fire works, but they hadnt started yet, just some small personal fire works clearly distint in the sky compared to anything else. a bright orange light appeared in the distance some miles away, but so large, it appeared to be quite large for the distance i estimated it to be , and i am trained in this, so i know the distance, and how high it may have been.  well the thing appeared out of know where as i was looking in that direction, and saw when it appeared.  it was moving in a small semi circle but hovering.  it was not a plane or a helo, because there were planes int the air clearly visible as our creations, and not a blimp or jet liner. i am a pilot, and have never seen anything like this. i hoverd for a while, and just vanished straigt up in the air at an incredible speed.
content.summary: Wittnessed arange color sphere hovering in sky, then changing direction, and vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were pulling into an unoccupied parking lot to view our local firework display.  just as we were getting set to exit the vehicle, we saw a red/orange egg shaped object climbing quickly in the distance.  my first reaction was that the firework show was beginning early.  we both said at the same time "what is that?", because it became brighter as it climbed and did not explode.  we both jumped out of our suv and began questioning what we were seeing further.  the object then slowed as it continued on an arcing path upward.  the object began to slowly change colors in a very slow pulsating manner.  it started as a red/orange, then a yellow, and eventually a bright white.  my wife attempted to capture the image on her cell phone but was unable to do so.  it continued to climb higher and higher.  it eventually disappeared into the thick cloud cover.  the event lasted approximately 2 - 3 minutes.

at first, the object climbed quickly with a slight trail.  it was very bright and fairly large.  the initial brightness was astounding.  as it slowed and began to change color, it became less bright.  

i looked for aircraft lights but there weren't any present.  it was just one ball of light.  we heard no sound from the object.  

neither my wife or myself could come up with an explanation for what we witnessed.  it was definitely not an airplane or helicopter.  it was a flying object like nothing we have ever seen.
content.summary: Rose quickly appearing like a fireball.  climbed at a slight angle and slowly changed colors eventually disappearing high into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my mom were just getting done shopping at the oxford valley mall. it was a rather warm night, but the sky was clear of clouds and other obstructions. as we got in the car, i looked up to the sky at random and noticed 8 hovering lights. at first they just seemed like lights reflecting off the ground, or maybe even fireworks because of the upcoming holiday. not very big ufo believers, me and my mom just kind of shook the suspicion off. however, we still had to head into the direction of the lights to get back home. after about 15 minutes past and the lights didn't seem to fade or move away, we played with the idea of 'aliens.' we've seen the movies, especially signs, which was filmed in bucks county. and i've always been a fan of the hit tv series the x files. it seemed a little odd to me that 8 random lights would just be sitting in the sky. we didn't want to seem a little crazy to the idea of ufos in bucks county. i don't know anyone who supports the theory and i didn't want people to think i was off the wall, so me and my mom toyed with the notion of it, and then let it go.

two days later, the story was in the paper. we weren't the only 2 people in the world to see weird hovering lights. mufon investigators are now coming to investigate the possiblities of what it may or may not have been. i guess we weren't crazy after all...
content.summary: Me and my mom noticed weird hovering lights above the oxford valley mall.

content.detailedDescription: I believe it was the summer of 1988.  we lived in ewing twp nj, glendale section, which is in the flight path of mercer co. airport.  i was again sitting on my porch at apprx. 1-130am when i saw a verylarge mass, very slowly appearing over the roof of the house across the street from my house.  i first just saw a small white light and a small red light both non blinking on the object, which was enormous.  it ver slowly crossed the street towards my house at aq very very low speed.  due to the extended roof over my porch, i had to now step down into my flower garden to view the object.  i swear it was just about hovering over my house, no more than 50-60ft. i am now directly underneath the object which seemed square,maybe oblong, with different levels.  all the levels had white lights(non blinking).  it looked like a city, or factory at night.  due to the darkness and its enormous size, i really could not tell the dimensions.  it made a very strong rumbling noise, but yet it was not real loud. it slowly went to my back yard and then sped up and went out of sight.  my wife was in the bathroom at the time and yelled out the window what was that. it shook the whole house, you could feel the vibrations in and out of the house.  i ran into the house told her what i saw and called the mercer co airport.(4miles away).  i asked if they saw anything on their radar.  they said they turn their radar off at midnight and phila. airport takes over.  i thought that was strange.  i called the trentonian newspaper, and told a reporter what i saw.  he laughed and said he did not receive any other reports and then hung up.  the only reason i am reporting this now is because i live in bensalem  pa. and lately there have been several reports on ufos very recently.  ewing twp. is apprx. 20-25 miles from bensalem pa.  i am hoping now maybe someone will believe me.  i would take a polygraph test on everything that i have stated.  i might add that i was a law enforcement officer in mercer co. until 1980.  this is my 2nd report dated 7-4-08
content.summary: Enormous, rectangular,oblong 1 white light (non blinking) 1 red (non blinking) on top or side of object.  different levels in the bottom, each level 1 white light

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i saw a light moving across the sky while talking outside as i was leaving that we thought might be a satellite b/c it seemed too high to be a plane and we didn���t see any flashing lights.  it seemed pretty bright.  we then noticed, as it was passing overhead, no noise and it was shifting left and right in flight.  it was not flying straight like a plane or satellite would.  we could not figure out what it was.  it traveled over the arvada, co area toward the north-northwest until we lost site.
we also looked back where it had come from and noticed a similar light that was hovering.  about the same altitude, brightness, shape, etc., but it just hovered.  it was shifting erratically from left to right, up and down, but it generally remained in the same spot in the sky.  we watched it for close to 30-45 minutes expecting it to do something, but it just continued doing what we had observed.  we left at that point but have no idea what we had just seen.
content.summary: 2 bright lights. 1 hovered erratically, the other flew across the sky in nnw direction while swerving.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I've been interested in the unknown since i was a kid,and have often had family descusions on the subject of,are we alone?
anyway we have a country property in  victoria,region called pyrenees in  australia.Which we frequently go to regulary.The nights are most of the time very clear,through the year.I always go rabbiting and mostly at night.The time was approx 11.00-12.00 pm, i felt a bit tyred and decided to head back with my bunnies, the mood was good.After putting everything away and thought about settling in for the night,i looked up to view a brilliant night sky,the evening was crisp.With my maglite torche in hand i held it above my head and switched it on and off four times,alot like a ship would using code.We'll to my amazement & shock i got a rather surprise when i saw a light flash back at me,but alot more intensly,like a powerful camera flash four times.About twice the size of a bright star,and motionless.So i did it again,thinking i'm seeing things,and again it flashed four times brightly and clearly,only this time it was in a different position than before.But across to my right,it could'nt travel that quick? i thought someone was playing a joke.

about 2 weeks past and my dad and i where out on the paddock,checking on our olive trees.Time was approx 1pm afternoon,we noticed four men dressed in black wearing vests,they looked militery like.They jogged across the field and up the other side of valley.I did'nt go over to them because we were busy with our duties,they seemed to avoid contact,and did'nt wave.
when we got back to house,time was around 5pm in afternon. i keeped an i on them with binoculiars,it was getting dark ,i told dad ,there still here.Whats going on? after dinner approx 8pm evening,they were like in a row with there torches,alot like the phenioux lights,but on the ground.I could see through binnoculiars what they were doing.Whats going on,is this a stage,who are these people and why.Approx 9pm evening they began to leave,but i could see them hopping over fences in the twilight,funny.
content.summary: Out evening hunting, looked up saw disc the size of moon glide silently over me, about 500 feet,going on and off like light, approx 10 sec.

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple large ufo's were seen by me and four to six others in abingdon, va. i am an ex military paratrooper and pathfinder. i have seen and jumped out of just about every military aircraft in service, and have never seen anything like this. large black rectangle with lights (smaller) on each of four corners underneath, one larger, dimmer set back from front two and centered, with large red beacon rotating in center. first was at about 2,000 ft (i know as ive jumped from that level), second in half hour later as we watched it descend through 8,ooo ft to about 4 to 5,000, level out, move east and then begin to rise at about 8 miles out over bristol, tn. both moved at 45 to 60 knots going east to west along interstate 81 and lee hwy. first went right over my head on beverly drive in abingdon and others saw them as they passed directly in front of us at an insanely close distance.


sincerely, 
dennis j. wisnosky jr.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Abingdon, va/ bristol tn rectangular craft @ 22:08
